Conversation.line: I'd kill for some meth right now.
I think you should cut back on the methamphetamine for a while.
Better watch what you say, junkie.
I can't do this.
I think I'm going to throw up.
I shouldn't be here. I want to go home.
I feel like I'm dying! I can't do this!
Cut it out.
I need some of that anabolic stuff...
I think you should cut back on the anabolic steroids for a while.
No you don't, you're fine, junkie.
I can't do this.
I think I'm going to throw up.
I shouldn't be here. I want to go home.
Craving a beer right now...
Could do with a beer.
I need a beer, it's been a bit.
You shouldn't drink on the job.
Anybody seen a beer nearby?
Need me some alcohol.
Hey! Did someone drink my alcohol?
Nope, you drank it all.
Are you lying to me?
Goddamn, I really could use some alcohol...
You shouldn't drink on the job.
Cut it out.
I need it... I need flesh...
You need to stop eating human flesh, it could give you a disease.
Are you insane?
I can't do this.
I think I'm going to throw up.
I shouldn't be here. I really need a slab of flesh.
I feel like I'm dying! I can't do this! I need meat!
We need to do something about the cannibalism happening around here.
Cut it out.
